DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study evaluate safety profile tolerability single oral dos BMS-650032 subject chronic hepatitis C infection
DOC.brief_title: A Single Ascending Dose Study BMS-650032 HCV Infected Subjects
DOC.criteria: Chronically infect HCV genotype 1 Treatment naive treatment nonresponders treatment intolerant HCV RNA viral load ≥10*5 IU/mL BMI 18 35kg/m² Any significant acute chronic medical illness stable control medication consistent HCV infection Major surgery within 4 week study drug administration gastrointestinal surgery could impact absorption study drug Coinfection HIV HBV Women childbearing potential
